results.content: Having a background in electronics, i dont have a programing background. Lessons are easy to understand for person like me, learnt cloud computing till medium- advanced level.
results.content_html: Having a background in electronics, i dont have a programing background. Lessons are easy to understand for person like me, learnt cloud computing till medium- advanced level.

results.content:
Being from development background, i was very passionate about learning AWS cloud that could help me in my career. I took a few courses for learning aws, but only one or two really met my expectations. I was eager to learn not just as a beginer to cloud computing but wanted to learn something about each popular service in different categories like dynamodb in database, s3 in storage, security, devops and mobile development. While a lot of courses on udemy explore a particular section of aws, this course is truely a bootcamp.
Also i expected some projects on topics like lambda that is vital for any cloud professional. Almost satisfied by the depth of some projects in this course.
results.content_html:

While a lot of courses on udemy explore a particular section of aws, this course is truely a bootcamp.

results.content:
I found this course useful for learning a large on of amazon cloud services and tools in a very detailed manner with practical projects.

Also recommended for AWS certification aspirants.
